loadLastArchive.title: Load Last Archive
loadLastArchive.hint: Whether to automatically load the latest chat archive when opening the menu.

archive.title: Open Chat Archives
archive.hint: Opens a separate window to browse, create, or add chat archives.

replaceButtons.title: Replace the Export Chat Log Button
replaceButtons.hint: Replaces the "Export Chat Log" button in chat with "Create Archive". Right clicking the button opens the Chat Archives.

removeButton.title: Remove the Clear Chat Log Button
removeButton.hint: Removes the "Clear Chat Log" button in chat.

remove.title: Remove an Archive
remove.content:
Are you sure you want to remove the following archive?

"{title}"

This does not remove the file from your system. You can add it back using the "Add an Archive" button. To permanently remove it, after removing it here delete the file from your file system.
